title: Olivet d’en Pujol
description: An agricultural storage and processing facility including a large number of dolia, likely associated with a Roman villa or suburban fundus, Olivet d'en Pujol is located in the modern municipality of Vilademat, which is in the Catalonian comarca of Alt Empordà.
names: Olivet de la Pujada del Delme

properties.description: Centerpoint of remains visible in Google Earth historical imagery dated 12/31/2009.
properties.title: Imagery Location of visible remains
